windows.command: if (-not (Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; . .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; python -m pip install -e .[test,dev]

linux.command: if [ ! -d ".venv" ]; then python3 -m venv .venv; fi && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && python -m pip install -e .[test,dev]

osx.command: if [ ! -d ".venv" ]; then python3 -m venv .venv; fi && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && python -m pip install -e .[test,dev]
